text: The Éditions du Rocher is a publishing house based in Monaco. It publishes works of literature as well as books about current affairs and well-being. It was founded by Charles Orengo in 1943. It was sold to Éditions Privat in 2005, Éditions Desclée de Brouwer in 2009, and Éditions Artège in 2014. ==Further reading== * ==References== Category:Publishing companies of Monaco Category:Publishing companies established in 1943 Category:1943 establishments in Monaco
title: Éditions du Rocher
